habla-description: Habla is a nostr-based web app that enables anyone to earn from their writing.
extension-descr: Use a nostr extension for logging in. This is the recommended method.
public-key-descr: Log in with a public key or nostr address. Read only.
create-account-descr: We are working on this feature. In the meantime you can create a nostr account in
title: Title
summary-placeholder: A brief summary of your article
tags-placeholder: List of tags separated by comma: nostr, markdown
search-description: Paste a nostr ID (npub, nprofile, note, nevent or naddr), nostr address (tony@habla.news) or a URL with a nostr ID to see it in Habla
search-more: Hashtags are supported, use a #in front of a term to filter by hashtags.
search-placeholder: URL, nostr ID or nostr address
author: Author
not-found-long: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you are looking for
server-error-long: This is likely a bug in Habla, sorry for the inconvenience
share-cta: Share your article with the world!
share-url-cta: Human-readable URL, use this when sharing oustide of nostr.
share-nostr-cta: Nostr ID, use this when sharing on nostr.
